function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate architectural design leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among patients and employees.","Mitigation":"Implementation of design strategies to improve infection prevention and control.","Technologies":"Biometric access control, air filtration systems, UV disinfection.","People":"Patients, employees, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Architects, civil engineers, policymakers."},{"Description":"Lack of risk management and control measures for capturing harmful pathogens such as COVID-19 in buildings.","Impact":"Vulnerable buildings leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Development of risk management protocols and control measures for capturing harmful pathogens.","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, air quality monitoring, disinfection protocols.","People":"Patients, employees, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Healthcare administrators, architects, civil engineers."},{"Description":"Inadequate risk communication regarding infectious disease prevention and control within the built environment.","Impact":"Misunderstanding and lack of awareness leading to increased risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementing effective risk communication strategies and education programs.","Technologies":"Digital signage, health information systems, communication software.","People":"Patients, employees, general public.","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare administrators, architects."}]}
